name: csv-data-management
label: CSV Data Management
description: CSV Data management will allow to read  and import CSV rows as records, along with options to deduplicate , merge two CSV files and then import and more utility functions

operations.title: Extract Data from Single CSV
operations.description: This action will extract data from CSV based on column names provided. User can select option to deduplicate rows based on columns

parameters.title: Column Names
parameters.name: columnNames
parameters.description: comma separated  columns name you want to extract from CSV File
parameters.tooltip: comma separated columns name you want to extract from CSV File

parameters.title: Deduplicate Values on
parameters.name: deDupValuesOn
parameters.description: Column name you want to use deduplicate date  from CSV File
parameters.tooltip: Column name you want to use deduplicate date  from CSV File

parameters.title: Number of rows to skip
parameters.name: numberOfRowsToSkip
parameters.description: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will not be skipped as it has column names
parameters.tooltip: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will not be skipped as it has column names

parameters.title: Convert recordset into batch
parameters.name: recordBatch
parameters.description: If set , will return rows as recordSet in list of 20 batches otherwise complete result in a single variable
parameters.tooltip: If set , will return rows as recordSet in list of 20 batches otherwise complete result in a single variable

operations.title: Merge and Extract Data from two CSV
operations.description: This action will extract data from CSV based on column names provided ,by merging two CSV file. User can select option to deduplicate rows based on columns

parameters.title: First File Column Names
parameters.name: file1_column_names
parameters.description: comma separate list of columns name you want to extract from CSV File
parameters.tooltip: comma separate list of columns name you want to extract from CSV File

parameters.title: Number of rows to skip from First File
parameters.name: numberOfRowsToSkipFirst
parameters.description: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will not be skipped as it has column names
parameters.tooltip: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will not be skipped as it has column names

parameters.title: Second File Column Names
parameters.name: file2_column_names
parameters.description: comma separate list of columns name you want to extract from CSV File
parameters.tooltip: comma separate list of columns name you want to extract from CSV File

parameters.title: Number of rows to skip from Second File
parameters.name: numberOfRowsToSkipSecond
parameters.description: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will not be skipped as it has column names
parameters.tooltip: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will not be skipped as it has column names

parameters.title: Merge on Column
parameters.name: mergeColumnNames
parameters.description: Column name which is common in two files which you want to use to merge data from both files
parameters.tooltip: Column name which is common in two files which you want to use to merge data from both files

parameters.title: Deduplicate Values on
parameters.name: deDupValuesOn
parameters.description: Column name you want to use deduplicate date  from CSV File
parameters.tooltip: Column name you want to use deduplicate date  from CSV File

parameters.title: Convert recordset into batch
parameters.name: recordBatch
parameters.description: If set , will return rows as recordSet in list of 20 batches otherwise complete result in a single variable
parameters.tooltip: If set , will return rows as recordSet in list of 20 batches otherwise complete result in a single variable

operations.title: Concat and Extract Data from two CSV
operations.description: This action will extract data by concatting two CSV file. User can select option to deduplicate rows based on columns

parameters.title: First File Column Names
parameters.name: file1_column_names
parameters.description: comma separate list of columns name you want to extract from CSV File
parameters.tooltip: comma separate list of columns name you want to extract from CSV File

parameters.title: Number of rows to skip from First File
parameters.name: numberOfRowsToSkipFirst
parameters.description: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will not be skipped as it has column names
parameters.tooltip: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will not be skipped as it has column names

parameters.title: Second File Column Names
parameters.name: file2_column_names
parameters.description: comma separate list of columns name you want to extract from CSV File
parameters.tooltip: comma separate list of columns name you want to extract from CSV File

parameters.title: Number of rows to skip from Second File
parameters.name: numberOfRowsToSkipSecond
parameters.description: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will not be skipped as it has column names
parameters.tooltip: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will not be skipped as it has column names

parameters.title: Deduplicate Values on
parameters.name: deDupValuesOn
parameters.description: Column name you want to use deduplicate date  from CSV File
parameters.tooltip: Number of rows you want to skip from top of CSV File. Note first row will not be skipped as it has column names

parameters.title: Convert recordset into batch
parameters.name: recordBatch
parameters.description: If set , will return rows as recordSet in list of 20 batches otherwise complete result in a single recordSet
parameters.tooltip: If set , will return rows as recordSet in list of 20 batches otherwise complete result in a single recordSet
